member.summary: Sql Server Spatial Feature Layer

Set the table name of the database that you want to work.
Set the name of the column where are defined the "id" of each Feature.
Set the name of the column where the geometric data of the table is stored.
This last parameter is placed the SRID

member.name: T:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer
member.summary: Represents a layer made of feature data.
member.remarks:
Abstract class for all feature-based layers. Feature layers deal with the visualization of the underlying feature data source.
To create one's own FeatureLayer, it is necessary to set a FeatureSource.

member.name: E:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer.DrawingFeatures
member.summary: Raised right before drawing the features in the layer.
member.remarks: In event argument, there is a collection of features to draw. Features can be added or removed.

member.name: P:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer.WrappingMode
member.summary: Thie property gets or sets whether allow wrap date line.

member.name: M:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor of the class.

member.name: M:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer.OnDrawingFeatures(Mapgenix.Layers.FeaturesEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the DrawingFeatures event.

list.item:
call from a sub class to raise the event.
To add or remove features to be drawn.

member.param: Event arguments for the event.

member.name: P:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer.EditTools
member.summary: Gets the EditTools to easily edit features in the Feature Layer.
member.value: EditTools to easily edit features in the Feature Layer.
member.remarks: EditTools is a wrapper for editing.

member.name: P:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer.FeatureIdsToExclude
member.summary: Returns a collection of strings of record id of features to exclude from the Layer.

member.name: P:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer.QueryTools
member.summary: Gets the QueryTools to easily query Features of the Feature Layer.
member.value: QueryTools to easily query Features of the Feature Layer.
member.remarks: QueryTools is a wrapper for querying.

member.name: M:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer.SetupTools
member.summary: Sets up the EditTools and QueryTools objects.

remarks.para:
Concrete wrapper of abstract method SetupToolsCore.
As a concrete public method that wraps a Core method, Mapgenix reserves the right to add events and other logic returned by the Core version of the method.

member.name: M:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer.SetupToolsCore
member.summary: Sets up the EditTools and QueryTools objects.

remarks.para: Concrete wrapper of abstract method SetupTools.

member.name: M:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer.OpenCore
member.summary: Opens the feature layer to get it ready to use.
member.remarks: Abstract method called from the concrete public method Open.

member.name: M:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer.CloseCore
member.summary: Closes the feature layer and releases any resources it was using.
member.remarks: Protected virtual method is called from concrete public method Close.

member.name: M:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer.GetBoundingBoxCore
member.summary: Returns the bounding box of the feature layer.
member.returns: Bounding box of the feature layer..
member.remarks: Called from concrete public method GetBoundingBox.

member.name: P:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer.FeatureSource
member.summary: Gets the feature source for the feature layer.
member.value: Feature source for the feature layer.
member.remarks: Feature source is the provider of data to the feature layer. When you inherit from the FeatureLayer, set in the constructor the feature source to use.

member.name: P:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer.DrawingQuality
member.summary: Gets and sets the drawing quality for the canvas where the feature layer draws.
member.value: Drawing quality for the canvas where the feature layer draws.

member.name: P:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer.ZoomLevelSet
member.summary: Gets and sets the ZoomLevelSet containing the specific zoom levels for the feature layer.
member.value: ZoomLevelSet containing the specific zoom levels for the feature layer.
member.remarks: Each ZoomLevel contains the styles used to determine how to draw the features.

member.name: P:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer.DrawingMarginPercentage
member.summary: Gets and sets a drawing margin as a percentage of the size of the map to ensure the labeling for features on the edge is displayed.
member.value: Drawing margin as a percentage of the size of the map to ensure the labeling for features on the edge is displayed.

member.name: P:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer.IsOpenCore
member.summary: Returns true if the feature layer is open and false if it is not.
member.value: True if the feature layer is open and false if it is not.

member.name: M:Mapgenix.Layers.BaseFeatureLayer.DrawCore(Mapgenix.Canvas.BaseGeoCanvas,System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection{Mapgenix.Canvas.SimpleCandidate})
member.summary: Draws the features of the feature layer based on the parameters passed in.
member.remarks: DrawCore is called when the layer is being drawn. It checks if the features are within the extent and whether it is within a defined zoom level. Then it applies the styles of the proper zoom level to the features for drawing. Finally, it draws the features on the GeoImage or native image passed in.
member.param: GeoCanvas to draw the layer.
Labels in all the layers.

Unit of the map.
